ygData.subject: Split Personality
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Her body jerked every so often.  The Trainier program was fighting the device that held her in stasis lock.  A  small rbbon of smoke escaped from her head

::Spears::

Her body jerked every so often.  The Trainier program was fighting 
the device that held her in stasis lock.  A  small rbbon of smoke 
escaped from her head gear as well as at the device.  The trainer 
chip was no longer needed.  The program was now 95% complete, only a 
small portion of her original maximal program remained.   Her systems 
started running a self diognostic and her eyess opened, then closed 
again.  Her fists clentched up, then relaxed. Her maximal logic 
circuits were smoldering, but the trainer program was rebuilding the 
actual logic circuits to function with trainer logic.  The program 
also made sure that she would serve Prebon and be subservient to any 
other male trainer.  But her warrior program was being re-enforced as 
well.  She would fight to the death for the trainers when she came 
out of stasis lock.
